name: Closed Alive (VR)
description:
- What are you ready to eat to survive?

C.A. offers  to live through this condition in its own way. 

Imagine you've spent 570 days in a bunker without going outside. You're communicating with a girl via phone. She knows something about the whole situation  But you don't have time for thinking as you have to go on with surviving, and only search for food at the moments when you have strength will be able to make you closer to the completion. 

C.A. is a creepy, gloomy, oppressive and atmospheric hidden object game in Virtual Reality. Here you'll have to find food within the frames of one small shelter during certain time. Be sure, you'll look into each gap not once in order to find food. 

Make it alive? Make self alive!

Support Oculus Quest Version
This is tutorital "How To Sideload Apps And Games On Oculus Quest":
